appDesc.message: It is a Chrome extension that you can use specific patterns to block spams, and remove them from your wall when using Facebook

options_enableLockUI_desc.message:
Display Lock Icon when messages are locked.

( ATTENTION : If you disable this option, you will not be able to unlock messages !)

options_ignoreCaseSensitive_desc.message:
Enable this to make case insensitive.

( Example : If you enables this, pattern - 'Dog' will match any word like 'DOG' or 'dog' or 'DoG'. )

options_disableTicker_desc.message:
Check this if you want to disable the FB new feature - Ticker.

( Ticker? - Ticker shows you the things you can already see on Facebook, but in real time. )

options_enableUnseen_desc.message:
Enable Unseen feature can make your friends unknow whether you read the chatbox message or not

( ATTENTION: If you enable this option, you have to restart this extension to use it. )
